flawed_nl_solution:
Of the under-30s there for the second band, 40% are men because 100-60=<<100-60=40>>40
There are fifty under-30s there for the second band because 20 / 0.4 = <<20/0.4=50>>50
There are 100 people there to see the second band because 50 / 0.5 = <<50/0.5=100>>100
There are 150 people at the concert because 100 / (2/3) = <<100/(2/3)=105>>105
#### 105

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
